00017 void RandomFleePrey::update(Prey* owner, const list<Predator*>& movedPredators, const list<Predator*>& stateChangedPredators)
00018 {
00019     Utils* utils = Utils::get();
00020 
00021     Predator* nearestPredator = NULL;
00022     hgeVector nearestPosition(0, 0);
00023     hgeVector position = owner->getPosition();
00024 
00025     list<Predator*>::const_iterator iter1;
00026 
00027     for (iter1 = movedPredators.begin(); iter1 != movedPredators.end(); ++iter1)
00028     {
00029         if (owner->canSee(*iter1) || owner->canHear(*iter1))
00030         {
00031             SimulationManager::get()->getPreyManager()->preyNoticesPredator(owner, *iter1);
00032 
00033             if (nearestPredator == NULL)
00034             {
00035                 nearestPredator = *iter1;
00036                 nearestPosition = nearestPredator->getPosition();
00037             }
00038             else
00039             {
00040                 if (utils->distanceBetween(position, (*iter1)->getPosition()) < utils->distanceBetween(position, nearestPosition))
00041                 {
00042                     nearestPredator = *iter1;
00043                     nearestPosition = nearestPredator->getPosition();
00044                 }
00045             }
00046         }
00047     }
00048 
00049     if (nearestPredator == NULL)
00050     {
00051         owner->setBehaviorState(PASSIVE);
00052         int rand = utils->getRandomInt(1, 2000);
00053         if (rand < 20)
00054             owner->setHeading(utils->getRandomInt(0, 359));
00055 
00056         if (utils->getRandomInt(0, 30) <= 5)
00057             owner->move(1.0);
00058     }
00059     else
00060     {
00061         if (utils->getRandomInt(0, 500) < 10)
00062         {
00063             double angle = utils->angleBetween(position, nearestPosition);
00064             owner->setHeading(-utils->getRandomInt(angle - 20, angle + 20));
00065         }
00066 
00067         double distance = utils->distanceBetween(position, nearestPosition);
00068 
00069         owner->move(1.0 + (1.0 - distance / owner->getHearingDistance()) / 2);
00070         owner->setBehaviorState(FLEEING);
00071     }
00072 }
